TextView.android:text:
Total time: 30 mins 
 
 Category: Dinner
 
 Serving Size: 4
 
 Ingredients:
 4 Hamburger Patties
 4 Slices of Cheese (Recommended: American)
 4 Hamburger Buns
 

Instructions:
 1. Cook hamburger patties until around medium well
 2. Melt cheese on top of hamburger patties
 3. Toast hamburger buns
 4. Enjoy!
